page.title: 08The Chalfont St.Peter Church
page.content: I am doing a survey on the Chalfont St.Peter Church and the kind of changes that have been made. {Local History} The Church first known in 1196 fell down in a storm in 1708.It was built again and the present church was opened in 1714. {Changing Times} In the last ten years there seems to be a larger congregation and younger people attend especially the communion.Also nearly all the testaments are new and the prayer books seem to be more modern. {Religion} Every religion was alowed in the church even if the people weren't Church of England as it is today. {Events} There is a summer fete which both the school do next door and the church,there is a Christmas Bazar and also a womans institute.
